darkWeb.title: Dark Web Monitoring
darkWeb.context: Check if your email or company data has been compromised in data breaches

emailBreachCheck.title: Email Breach Check
emailBreachCheck.placeholder: Enter email address to check for breaches
emailBreachCheck.remarks: We'll search across known data breach databases to check if your email has been compromised.

webVulnerability.title: Web Vulnerability Assessment
webVulnerability.context: Comprehensive website security scanning and vulnerability detection with detailed reporting

freeAnnual.title: Free Annual Assessment Available
freeAnnual.body: Get one comprehensive vulnerability assessment per year at no cost. Additional assessments available for purchase at competitive rates.

reportsViaEmail.title: Assessment Reports Delivered via Email
reportsViaEmail.line1: All web vulnerability assessment reports will be sent directly to your registered email address upon completion. Reports are not stored in the T+ platform for security and privacy reasons.
reportsViaEmail.line2: Please check your email inbox (and spam folder) for assessment reports after requesting a scan.

consultingServices.title: Consulting Services
consultingServices.context: Professional cybersecurity services and solutions from trusted partners

networkBoxforSMEs.title: Network Box Managed Security Services for SMEs
networkBoxforSMEs.body: Comprehensive managed security services providing 24/7 SOC monitoring, managed firewall, and threat intelligence specifically designed for small and medium enterprises.
